term.title: compartmental analysis

item.text: Mathematical process leading to a model of transport of a substance in terms of compartments and rate constants, usually taking the form C = A e- α t + B e- β t ... is the substance concentration; A, B,… are proportionality constants; α, β,… are rate constants; and t is time.

item.alttext: C = A e- α t + B e- β t ...
